typeSystemDescription.name: hw1-xchu-typesystem
typeSystemDescription.description: Defines type systems for QA system.

typeDescription.name: QAAnnotation.Base
typeDescription.description: A base annotation type. All other types inherit from this base annotation type.

featureDescription.name: source
featureDescription.description: To keep track of where an annotation was originally made by

typeDescription.name: QAAnnotation.Question
typeDescription.description: Question annotation. The system will read input file and annotate the question

typeDescription.name: QAAnnotation.Answer
typeDescription.description: Answer annotation. The system will read input file and annotate the answer. This class will record whether or not the answer is correct

featureDescription.name: isCorrect
featureDescription.description: Answer annotation will record whether or not the answer is correct

typeDescription.name: QAAnnotation.Token
typeDescription.description: The system will annotate each token span in each question and answer

typeDescription.name: QAAnnotation.NGram
typeDescription.description: The system will annotate N-grams of consecutive tokens

featureDescription.name: elementType
featureDescription.description: The annotation will output the element type

typeDescription.name: QAAnnotation.AnswerScore
typeDescription.description: The answer score annotation will record the score assigned to the answer

typeDescription.name: QAAnnotation.Evaluation
typeDescription.description: The system will evaluate the answers by using this annotation

featureDescription.name: precision
featureDescription.description: Calculate precision at N( where N is the total number of correct answers)

featureDescription.name: sorted_answer
featureDescription.description: The system will sort the answers according to their scores
